Comment: I thought I'd annotate my loss against this opponent since I annotated the win I think it's pretty interesting, for a while I had the advantage but I blundered it away Actually, for most of the game I was materially ahead, but I took a rook with my queen early on and lost the use of it for the rest of the game.
Trying to get Scholar's mate. It's been used against me so many times I've memorized the responses.
